body_html: It's not the matter of unpacking. Your PR reduced the number of narrows we have, which will make backwards faster. Actually I just realized that just putting the code in an autograd function, and implementing its backward manually will probably make it a few times faster

body: It's not the matter of unpacking. Your PR reduced the number of narrows we have, which will make backwards faster. Actually I just realized that just putting the code in an autograd function, and implementing its backward manually will probably make it a few times faster
